titleStmt.title: The best interest, or, A treatise of a saving interest in Christ wherein is shewn how a man may know that he hath a saving interst in Christ, how they that have not yet an interest in Christ may get a saving interest in him ... with several other practical cases / by Owen Stockton ...
titleStmt.author: Stockton, Owen, 1630-1680.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and torn, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
